text: Lock Up is a 1989 American action prison movie directed by John Flynn and starring Sylvester Stallone, Donald Sutherland, John Amos, Tom Sizemore, Larry Romano, Frank McRae, Sonny Landham, Danny Trejo. It was distributed by Tri- Star Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1989 action movies Category:1980s American action movies Category:American prison movies Category:Movies set in New Jersey Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies directed by John Flynn
title: Lock Up (1989 movie)
